item.title: Hallucination Detox: Sensitive Neuron Dropout (SeND) for Large Language Model Training
item.description: New training method, SeND, reduces large language model hallucinations by up to 40% by selectively dropping unreliable neurons during training, improving accuracy and efficiency.

item.title: Ichigo: Mixed-Modal Early-Fusion Realtime Voice Assistant
item.description: Ichigo: a real-time voice assistant fusing speech & text via a unified transformer, achieving state-of-the-art performance with 111ms latency!

item.title: M-RewardBench: Evaluating Reward Models in Multilingual Settings
item.description: M-REWARDBENCH, a new multilingual benchmark, reveals significant performance gaps in reward models across languages, highlighting the need for improved multilingual alignment in LLMs.
